DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether active parent involvement in deliberation and choice improves subsequent medication persistence for their child with ADHD.
DOC.brief_title: Does Active Parent Involvement in Deliberation and Choice Improve Medication Persistence for Their Child With ADHD
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with ADHD based on DSMIV criteria Enrolled in schoolsetting No learning disability No past use of psychoactive medication Do not meet DSMIV criteria for ADHD Not enrolled in schoolsetting Presence of learning disability History of brain injury Past use of psychoactive medication
